subject: From the Office of Presidency.
body:
From the Office of Presidency.
The senior special Adviser to Nigeria President on Contract Matters.
:Attn: SIR/ MA.
REF: YOUR PAYMENT VERIFICATION AND CLEARANCE NOTICE.
THIS  IS TO  ALERT YOU OF THE IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF  YOUR CONTRACT/INHERITANCE  FUND.  YOU ARE HEREBY ADVISE TO RECONFIRM YOUR DETAILS HERE FOR IMMEDIATE TRANSFER TO YOUR FUND PAYMENT SETTLEMENT.
WE LOOK FORWARD TO HEAR FROM YOU WITH ALL YOUR CONTACT DETAILS FOR THE FINAL RELEASE OF YOUR CONTRACT AMOUNT.
Hajia Widad Babiker Omer.
The senior special Adviser to Nigeria President on Contract Matter

subject: Re: From the Office of Presidency.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the release of my contract fund. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. Could you please provide me with more information about the process and what steps I need to take to ensure the smooth transfer of the funds?

Additionally, I would like to confirm the authenticity of this communication. Is there a way for me to verify your position as the senior special adviser to Nigeria's President on Contract Matters? It is important for me to be cautious and ensure that I am dealing with legitimate individuals.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Renaldo
